messages.title: The Lib Dems Are Winning
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats have continued to grow following their stunning success at the local and European elections in May. Recent polls show support for the Liberal Democrats is now at record levels and Jo Swinson is the most popular party leader. MPs from Labour and the Conservatives are joining the Lib Dems, fed up with the broken politics the two old parties represent.

messages.title: Demand Better for Britain
messages.content: Sign up here to support a Liberal Democrat government to deliver a brighter future for our country.

messages.title: Working Hard for Calder Valley
messages.content: "We are Yorkshire folk and we want to take control of our destiny. I stand firmly for Yorkshire Devolution to make our decisions for our future locally."

messages.title: Remember...
messages.content: Javed lives locally and volunteers at food-banks & local community organisations. Javed supports businesses to grow & create new jobs, the key ingredient for prosperity.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Keeping GPs open and hospitals fully staffed, free at the point of use.
Preventing flooding and tackling future climate emergencies.
Including £6bn extra funding for the NHS, 1p on the £1 in dividend tax promised. 1 in 8 NHS staff is an EU national, the UK desperately need their skills and to secure the future of the NHS.

issues.brexitEurope: A Liberal Democrat government led by Jo Swinson will stop Brexit on day one and get on with the job of improving people's lives.
issues.environment: Climate Change. Climate change and air pollution threaten our future. Working with the EU enables us to set higher environmental standards and work together to protect our planet. Global Liberal Democrats will put Britain on a path to becoming carbon neutral at the earliest possible date.
issues.health: NHS - Keeping GPs open and hospitals fully staffed, free at the point of use.
issues.immigration: EU citizens make a huge contribution to our NHS, schools and care services. 1 in 10 NHS doctors are EU citizens, along with 13,000 EU academics and over 100,000 EU teachers. In the EU, we can retain these vital staff and protect our right to work, study and retire across Europe.
issues.labourEmployment: Supporting businesses to grow & create new jobs.

community.content: Supporting businesses to grow & create new jobs, the key ingredient for prosperity.

leaflet.personalStatement: "We are Yorkshire folk and we want to take control of our destiny. I stand firmly for Yorkshire Devolution to make our decisions for our future locally."

images.caption: Javed Bashir working for Calder Valley

examples: Recent polls show support for the Liberal Democrats is now at record levels and Jo Swinson is the most popular party leader.
The Liberal Democrats have continued to grow following their stunning success at the local and European elections in May.
"We are Yorkshire folk and we want to take control of our destiny. I stand firmly for Yorkshire Devolution to make our decisions for our future locally."
Supporting businesses to grow & create new jobs, the key ingredient for prosperity.
A Liberal Democrat government led by Jo Swinson will stop Brexit on day one and get on with the job of improving people's lives.
NHS - Keeping GPs open and hospitals fully staffed, free at the point of use.

Climate change and air pollution threaten our future. Working with the EU enables us to set higher environmental standards and work together to protect our planet. Global Liberal Democrats will put Britain on a path to becoming carbon neutral at the earliest possible date.
The Conservatives want to force through a damaging Brexit that will wreck our economy and risk the end of the United Kingdom.
Who knows where Jeremy Corbyn stands on Brexit? Labour now say they want to negotiate their own Brexit deal.
Who knows where Jeremy Corbyn stands on Brexit? Labour now say they want to negotiate their own Brexit deal.
